snippet: A restored 1888 townhouse at 26 East 80th Street has returned to the sales market after spending two years as a specialized rental.
abstract: Exquisitely preserved townhouse at 26 East 80th street, formerly the Argentine mission to the United Nations, is offered at $21 million.
lead_paragraph: A restored 1888 townhouse at 26 East 80th Street has returned to the sales market after spending two years as a specialized rental.

headline.seo: Restored Upper East Side Townhouse at $21 Million
